alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Jefferson; Leon; Taylor; Wakulla (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 16 at 12:25PM EDT until June 16 at 1:15PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: The National Weather Service in Tallahassee has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Wakulla County in Big Bend of Florida... Jefferson County in Big Bend of Florida... Northwestern Taylor County in Big Bend of Florida... Leon County in Big Bend of Florida... Central Franklin County in Big Bend of Florida... * Until 115 PM EDT. * At 1224 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Doak Campbell Stadium to 7 miles southwest of St. Marks to 13 miles east of Carrabelle to 7 miles south of St George Island, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Woodville, Carrabelle, Monticello, Florida State University, Eastpoint, Tallahassee Community College, St. Marks, Crawfordville, Florida A and M, St George Island, Doak Campbell Stadium, Wakulla, Franklin, Sopchoppy, Alma, Lake Bradford, Cody, Wakulla Springs and St George Island St Pk. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
